abstract: Dubai World borrowed billions of dollars to acquire some of the most high-profile commercial developments in the United States in recent years, and it could be forced to sell them at a loss if the Persian Gulf conglomerate cannot restructure its debts.
snippet: Dubai World borrowed billions of dollars to acquire some of the most high-profile commercial developments in the United States in recent years, and it could be forced to sell them at a loss if the Persian Gulf conglomerate cannot restructure its d...
lead_paragraph: Dubai World borrowed billions of dollars to acquire some of the most high-profile commercial developments in the United States in recent years, and it could be forced to sell them at a loss if the Persian Gulf conglomerate can’t restructure its debts.

headline.main: Dubai World May Have to Check Out of U.S. Hotels

abstract: Lazard said Tuesday that it has hired Brian D. O’Neill, a former Treasury Department official and JPMorgan Chase banker, as a vice chairman of Lazard International to bolster the investment bank’s business in Central and South America.
snippet: Lazard said Tuesday that it has hired Brian D. O’Neill, a former Treasury Department official and JPMorgan Chase banker, as a vice chairman of Lazard International to bolster the investment bank’s business in Central and South America.
lead_paragraph: Lazard said Tuesday that it has hired Brian D. O’Neill, a former Treasury Department official and JPMorgan Chase banker, as a vice chairman of Lazard International to bolster the investment bank’s business in Central and South America.

headline.main: Lazard Hires Ex-Treasury Official for International Arm
